Options and social sentiment data unavailable per instructions; factor score caps applied.

top5.name: Warner Bros. Discovery, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Deal/proxy-fight narrative fades quickly or turns adverse (e.g., court/board actions reduce probability of a transaction), and price loses short-term trend support (fails to hold above key moving averages).

primary_catalyst.title: Hostile M&A / proxy fight escalation around Paramount bid for WBD
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Multiple same-day reports indicate Paramount is suing and planning a proxy fight tied to a hostile bid for WBD, which can drive rapid repricing via deal-probability changes and headline volatility within a 1-week window.

sources.title: Paramount sues in hostile bid to buy Warner Bros Discover
Paramount files lawsuit in pursuit of Warner Bros. Discovery and threatens proxy fight
Paramount Plans Proxy Fight to Push Hostile Warner Bid

risk_factors: Binary headline risk: litigation/proxy fight can swing both directions; deal probability can collapse quickly.
Market regime risk: broad risk-off tape can overwhelm idiosyncratic M&A headlines.

top5.name: Walmart Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Post-inclusion/news pop mean-reverts; price fails to hold above short-term moving averages and volume dries up.

primary_catalyst.title: Index inclusion / partnership newsflow (Nasdaq 100 inclusion; Alphabet partnership and drone delivery expansion)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Index inclusion can create near-term forced buying and positioning flows; incremental partnership/product headlines can extend momentum over the next week if follow-through coverage continues.

sources.title: Stock Market Today, Jan. 12: Walmart Jumps on Nasdaq 100 Inclusion
Walmart Partners With Alphabet Unit, Expands Drone Deliveries
Walmart Stock Is Rising. It’s Not Just a Google AI Deal Giving It a Boost.

risk_factors: Already headline-driven: if inclusion/partnership is fully priced, upside may be limited versus 10% target.
Mega-cap beta: large market cap can make ≥10% in 7 trading days less frequent absent a major surprise.

top5.name: Alphabet Inc.

target.bear_case_note: AI partnership narrative stalls or is reframed as non-material; price fails to hold breakout area and momentum cools.

primary_catalyst.title: Apple–Alphabet AI partnership confirmation (AI-powered Siri)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Confirmation of an Apple AI partnership can shift expectations for distribution and monetization of Alphabet AI capabilities; continued details/coverage can drive a momentum extension over the next week.

sources.title: Alphabet briefly surpassed $4T on news of Apple AI partnership
It's Official: Apple and Alphabet Are Teaming Up for an AI-Powered Siri. Why This Is a Win for Both Companies.
Google's market cap hits $4 trillion, cementing its status as an AI trade champion

risk_factors: Mega-cap constraint: ≥10% in 7 trading days is less common without incremental surprise beyond partnership headlines.
Regulatory/DOJ overhang risk can inject volatility and cap upside.

top5.name: Apple Inc.

target.bear_case_note: AI Siri timeline remains vague; partnership is viewed as defensive/late; stock fails to follow through and slips back below short-term moving averages.

primary_catalyst.title: Apple AI Siri narrative boosted by confirmed partnership with Alphabet
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: A confirmed partnership aimed at an AI-powered Siri can re-rate near-term AI product expectations; additional details or analyst commentary can drive a momentum move within a week.

sources.title: It's Official: Apple and Alphabet Are Teaming Up for an AI-Powered Siri. Why This Is a Win for Both Companies.
Apple Investors Are Still Waiting for an AI Siri. A New Deal With Google Could Help It Deliver
Alphabet Becomes Newest $4 Trillion Company, Joining Nvidia

risk_factors: Mega-cap constraint: ≥10% in 7 trading days is less common without a discrete product/earnings surprise.
Narrative risk: partnership could be interpreted as reliance on third parties rather than Apple-led AI.

top5.name: Steel Dynamics, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Takeover bid narrative is rejected/abandoned with no follow-up; stock loses momentum and reverts with cyclicals/commodities.

primary_catalyst.title: M&A headline volatility: Steel Dynamics/SGH bid for BlueScope Steel (and response)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Active M&A headlines (bid submission and target response) can drive near-term repricing of STLD via capital allocation expectations and sector read-through; continued developments can create a 1-week volatility window.

sources.title: Steel Dynamics, SGH Bid $8.8 Billion to Acquire BlueScope Steel
BlueScope Steel rejects $8.8B takeover bid from Steel Dynamics, SGH
BlueScope Rejects Steel Dynamics, SGH Takeover Bid

risk_factors: Cyclical/commodity beta: steel names can be dominated by macro (rates, China demand, tariffs) over a 1-week horizon.
Capital allocation risk: market may penalize perceived overpaying or deal uncertainty after rejection.
